emotional_claims.text: But a subset of extremely online MAGA supporters are still deeply passionate about the Epstein case
The president seemed eager to move on, calling the Epstein case "sordid, but it's boring" while also blaming Democrats for continuing to make it an issue
Many Trump supporters are happy to follow the president's lead
Now, Donald Trump is finding it hard to shake loose the conspiracy theories that have animated his base since he first broke through into Republican politics a decade ago

Why the Epstein case looms large in MAGA world 7 hours ago Share Save Mike Wendling BBC News Share Save Getty Images Donald Trump, his now wife Melania, Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell pose for a photo in February 2000 When Jack Posobiec walked into the Department of Justice in Washington, DC last February, he thought he would finally get some answers about Jeffrey Epstein
